item.title: Binance Alpha has launched Zentry (ZENT), with an airdrop claiming initial threshold of 230 points.
item.description: On August 30th, as per an official announcement, Binance Alpha has declared the launch of Zentry (ZENT). Users who hold at least 230 Binance Alpha Points are eligible to claim 4,000 ZENT tokens through an airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. If the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour.Claiming the airdrop will require 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm their claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as forfeiting the airdrop.In addition, Binance will launch the ZENT Trading Competition, with a total reward of 96,200,000 ZENT to be distributed.

item.title: Analysis: Yesterday, a Bitcoin whale cashed out nearly $4 billion in profits, marking the largest single-day profit-taking since February 2025.
item.description: On August 30th, as per the monitoring of CryptoOnchain, yesterday Bitcoin's one-day realized profit witnessed a sharp surge of nearly $4 billion, marking the largest one-day profit-taking since early February 2025 (excluding the abnormal $9 billion realized profit on July 4th). This movement was mainly driven by whales. The distribution of realized profit among different whale groups is as follows:· Super Whales (>10,000 BTC): $2.17 billion· Large Whales (1,000 - 10,000 BTC): $1.25 billion· Other Whales (100 - 1,000 BTC): $495 millionCryptoOnchain stated that this massive profit-taking shows that long-term holding large investors have locked in substantial gains during the recent price rally. Such behavior usually occurs near local price tops, potentially indicating a short-term pullback or consolidation phase. This also implies that Bitcoin is transitioning from "strong hands" to "weak hands," which could increase the market's vulnerability. The peak of profit realization in this

item.title: A whale address has once again withdrawn 11,280 ETH from OKX, worth $49.2 million.
item.description: On August 30th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale address once more withdrew 11,280 ETH from OKX, with a value of $49.2 million. Currently, the whale is in possession of 18,540 ETH, which is worth $81.73 million.

item.title: This week, the U.S. Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a total net inflow of $440.8 million
item.description: On August 30th, based on the monitoring of Farside Investors, this week the cumulative net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF was $440.8 million. It includes:BlackRock IBIT: +$247.9 millionFidelity FBTC: +$33.5 millionBitwise BITB: +$46.2 millionARK ARKB: +$78.6 millionProShares BTCO: +$6.7 millionFranklin EZBC: +$6.5 millionVanEck HODL: +$10.2 millionWisdomTree BTCW: +$2.3 millionGrayscale GBTC: -$15.3 millionGrayscale Bitcoin Mini: +$24.2 million

item.title: The AI agent project Surf officially launched on Product Hunt, claiming the top spot on the platform's daily leaderboard.
item.description: On August 30th, according to official information, the AI agent project Surf has officially kicked off on Product Hunt and has now reached the top of the daily Product Hunt rankings.Surf is an AI Agent centered around the cryptocurrency industry. It is capable of making trading decisions by integrating a substantial amount of cryptocurrency-related information. It combines real-time social sentiment and blockchain data to provide research and execution services. Through simple and easy-to-understand language and in-depth insights from various sources, it assists users in understanding concepts like Risk-Weighted Assets (RWA) and Stablecoins.The official announcement shows that Surf is currently in the invitation-only stage. It has demonstrated steady growth, with more than 4000 daily active users within 4 weeks after the product's release and nearly 1000 paying users.

item.title: Freya announces its participation as the ICM Protocol for the Bonk ecosystem USD1 pair, supported by the Bonk team and Solana ecosystem contributors.
item.description: August 30th. As per official information, Freya is set to become the USD1 trading pair within the Bonk ecosystem's ICM (Internet Capital Market) protocol, with the backing of Bonk and the Solana ecosystem contributors. The founder, Natsuki, initially unveiled the Solana ICM protocol Freya Protocol at the Japan Solana ecosystem conference SuperTokyo the previous day and received support from Jupiter, Jito, Backpack, Sphere, Metaplex, Superteam, and the Solana Foundation.

item.title: A high-profile ETH to BTC ancient whale has sold 2000 BTC in the past 1 hour to buy ETH spot.
item.description: On August 30, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, a highly prominent BTC ancient whale that recently swapped ETH has deposited a total of 2,000 BTC (approximately $217 million) into Hyperliquid within the past hour for the purpose of selling and buying ETH spot.

item.title: The high-profile BTC whale, known for its ancient origins, has once again transferred 1000 BTC to HyperUnit to swap for ETH.
item.description: On August 30th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a highly prominent whale that had previously swapped ETH for BTC has once more deposited 1,000 BTC (valued at $108.35 million) into HyperUnit in order to exchange it for ETH.

item.title: 1 billion USD1 tokens were minted on the Solana network 50 minutes ago
item.description: August 30th. According to lookonchain's monitoring, 100 million USD1 was minted on the Solana network 50 minutes ago.
